top.name: Cast Iron
top.description: Amon gains increased Forgeskill Cooldown Rate and Gun Handling.

top.name: Gathering Storm
top.description:
Amon deals increased Elemental Damage for a Duration.
 This effect can stack.
 Max Stacks: 3 Stack Duration: 14s

top.name: Executioner
top.description:
Amon gains increased Critical Hit Damage.
 The effect is Doubled for a Duration after dealing Melee Damage.
 Double Duration: 8s

top.name: Get the Lead Out
top.description:
Amon gains increased Reload Speed.
 The effect is Doubled for a Duration after causing a Detonation.
 Double Duration: 12s

top.name: Destruction Engine
top.description: Amon gains increased Forgeskill Damage and Detonation Damage.

top.name: Tempered Pyre
top.description:
Whenever Amon activates his Forgeskill, he spawns an Axe Forgedrone that attacks nearby enemies for a Duration, dealing Incendiary Melee Damage.
 Activating a Forgeskill while Tempered Pyre is active fully Restores the Duration of all active Forgedrones.
 Forgedrone Duration: 20s

top.name: Bolt Action
top.description:
Whenever Amon Reloads, his Guns gain Bonus Shock Damage for a Duration.
 Duration: 4s

top.name: Bellows
top.description:
Whenever Amon Activates his Forgeskill, he gains increased Gun Damage for a Duration.
 Duration: 8s

top.name: Twin Tempers
top.description:
Tempered Pyre now spawns an additional Axe Forgedrone that deals Cryo Melee Damage.
 Forgedrones from Tempered Pyre have reduced Duration.
 Reduced Duration: 20%

top.name: Vital Organs
top.description:
Amon gains Critical Hit Chance with Guns for a Duration.
 This effect can stack.
 Max Stacks: 3 Stack Duration: 10s

top.name: Herald's Call
top.description: Amon gains increased Shock Damage.

left.name: Tempered Ice
left.description:
Whenever Amon activates his Ordnance, he spawns a Hammer Forgedrone that attacks nearby enemies for a Duration, dealing Cryo Melee Damage.
 Forgedrone Duration: 25s Cooldown: 30s

left.name: Cacophany
left.description: Amon gains increased Ordnance Damage and Detonation Radius.

left.name: Masterwork
left.description: Forgedrones gain increased Damage and Duration.

left.name: Endless Bombardment
left.description:
Grenades have a Chance to refund themselves on use.
 Heavy Ordnance have a Chance to refund 1 Ammo on damaging enemies.

left.name: Stoked
left.description:
Whenever Amon deals Ordnance Damage, he gains increased Fire Rate for a Duration.
 This effect can stack.
 Max Stacks: 3 Stack Duration: 12s

left.name: Ordained Hammer
left.description: Hammer Forgedrones now deal Ordnance Damage in addition to their other types and gain a Chance to cause a Detonation on damaging enemies, dealing Cryo Damage in an area.

middle.name: Blast Furnace
middle.description:
Whenever Amon or his Forgedrones Critically Hit an enemy or cause a Detonation, he gains increased Damage Dealt for a Duration.
 Detonations grant multiple Stacks.
 Detonation Stacks: +5 Max Stacks: 30 Stack Duration: 12s

middle.name: Tempered Lightning
middle.description:
Whenever Amon activates his Action Skill, he spawns a Sword Forgedrone that attacks nearby enemies for a Duration, dealing Shock Melee Damage.
 Activating an Action Skill while Tempered Lightning is active will partially Restore the Duration of all active Forgedrones.
 Duration: 18s

middle.name: Armor of Contempt
middle.description: Amon gains Overshield when he deals Action Skill Damage.

middle.name: Lightning Rod
middle.description:
Amon's Gun Shots have a Chance on Critical Hit to spawn an Elemental Bolt, dealing Shock Damage.
 Elemental Bolt Chance: 25% Cooldown: 8s

middle.name: Escalation
middle.description: Forgedrones gain increased Attack Speed and Movement Speed.

middle.name: Honed Point
middle.description:
Forgedrones have a Chance to Critically Hit.
 Whenever a Forgedrone Critically Hits, they partially restore Amon's Action Skill Cooldown.

right.name: Permafrost
right.description:
Whenever Amon Freezes an enemy, Cryo Hazard is created under them, dealing Cryo Damage for a Duration.
 Duration: 8s Cooldown: 2s

right.name: Raging Inferno
right.description: Action Skill Damage has a Chance to Critically Hit and Burn enemies when it does.

right.name: Wildheart
right.description: Amon gains increased Status Effect Damage and Hazard Damage.

right.name: Freezer Burn
right.description:
Dealing Incendiary Damage with Guns increases Cryo Damage for a Duration.
 Dealing Cryo Damage with Guns increases Incendiary Damage for a Duration.
 Duration: 12s

right.name: Reactive Armor
right.description: Detonations partially Restore Amon's Shield and Ordnance Cooldown.

right.name: Reverse Explosion
right.description:
Whenever Amon deals Forgeskill Damage, he creates a Drone Singularity for a Duration.
 Duration: 8s Cooldown: 60s

augments.name: Axe and Stone
augments.description:
Amon gains increased Movement Speed for a Duration after damaging an enemy with a Forgeaxe, and can Detonate Primed enemies with a Melee Attack.
 Detonating a Flame Axe restores Action Skill Cooldown.
 Detonating a Cryo Axe restores Ordnance Cooldown.
 Move Speed: +40% Move Speed Duration: 4s Active Skill Cooldown Restore: 40% Ordnance Cooldown Restore: 40%

augments.name: Endless War
augments.description:
Primed enemies take increased Gun Damage for each stack of Prime.
 If Amon Detonates a Primed enemy, a new Forgeaxe is spawned that seeks out a nearby enemy.
 Cooldown: 2s Gun Damage Received: +20% per Prime Stack

augments.name: Hour of the Hammer
augments.description:
Amon now readies Forgehammers, choosing Frost or Shock.
 Enemies damaged by Forgehammer are Primed for a Duration, and will Detonate when they die or are damaged by a Forgeskill, dealing Damage to nearby enemies.
 Can throw a Cryo Hammer, dealing Cryo Melee Damage in an area on impact, or a Shock Hammer, dealing Shock Melee Damage in an area on impact.
 Forgehammer Damage: 6,719

augments.name: Blade Tempest
augments.description:
Amon now readies Forgeswords, choosing Flame or Shock.
 Whenever activated, consume all Charges to launch a Barrage of Forgeswords.
 Enemies damaged by Forgeswords are Primed for a Duration, and will Detonate when they die or are damaged by a Forgeskill dealing Damage to the target, but none to nearby enemies.
 Can fire a Barrage of Flame Swords, dealing Incendiary Melee Damage, or a Barrage of Shock Swords, dealing Shock Melee Damage.
 This effect can stack.
 Forgesword Damage: 3,346 Detonation Damage: 3,346 per Prime Stack Forgeswords: 3 /Charge Charges: 3

augments.name: Searing Cold
augments.description:
Frost Axes apply Freeze on impact.
 Flame Axes now pass through enemies.

capstones.name: Snowmaul
capstones.description:
Double-Edge is now Snowmaul.
 Press and hold Action Skill to throw a Twinned Forgehammer, dealing Cryo Melee Damage to nearby enemies on impact that Ricochets between nearby enemies up to 3 times.
 If no Ricochet targets are found, it deals Damage an additional time before destroying itself.
 For each Detonation caused, it Ricochets an additional time.
 Twinned Forgehammer Damage: 6,719 Cooldown: 30s

capstones.name: Storm Surge
capstones.description:
Double-Edge is now Storm Surge.
 Press and hold Action Skill to throw a Twinned Forgeblade, dealing Shock Melee Damage in an area on impact.
 Storm Surge creates a Forgestorm on impact for a Duration, dealing Shock Status Effect Damage over time.
 Twinned Forgeblade Damage: 7,344 Forgestorm Damage/s: 2,141 Duration: 18s Cooldown: 35s

capstones.name: Conflangarang
capstones.description:
Double-Edge now deals Incendiary Melee Damage in both directions, gains increased Radius, and leaves a trail of Fire as it travels if close enough to the ground, dealing Incendiary Damage over time.
 Causing a Detonation or damaging an enemy with Conflangarang will restore Forgeskill Cooldown.
 Double-Edge Radius: +33% Fire Trail Damage/s: 1,606 Fire Trail Duration: 5s Forgeskill Cooldown Restoration: 10% Cooldown: 40s

top.name: Wrath of Nature
top.description:
Amon gains increased Status Effect Application Chance and Cryo Effectiveness.
 This effect is Doubled when his Action Skill is active.

top.name: Scorched Kairos
top.description: Amon gains increased Ordnance Damage and Magazine Size.

top.name: The Thrill
top.description:
Amon gains Missing Health Regeneration.
 Every time Amon takes or absorbs Non-Status Effect Damage, he gains a Stack of Resolute for a Duration, which increases this effect.
 Max Stacks: 20 Stack Duration: 14s

top.name: Battleborn
top.description:
Amon gains increased Gun Damage the more Full his Health.
 This effect is Doubled while Amon is at Maximum Health.

top.name: Eternal
top.description: Amon gains increased Action Skill Duration and Gun Swap Speed.

top.name: Tail of the Comet
top.description:
Whenever Amon deals Ordnance Damage, there is a Chance to apply a Cryo Status Effect that deals Cryo Damage over time for a Duration.
 Tail of the Comet is affected by Status Effect Application Chance.
 Freeze Chance: 20% Duration: 4s

top.name: Scar Tissue
top.description: Amon gains increased Maximum Health Capacity and Repkit Healing.

top.name: Bullet Hail
top.description:
Amon's Gun Shots have a Chance to Ricochet as an Elemental Shard, dealing Cryo Damage.
 Ricochet Damage: -25%

top.name: Machinist
top.description: Amon Restores a percentage of Ordnance Cooldown.

top.name: Ancient Ways
top.description: Amon deals increased Cryo Damage.

top.name: Warrior's Cup
top.description: Whenever Amon uses a Repkit while his Action Skill is active, partially restore Action Skill Duration.

left.name: Wildfire
left.description: Amon gains increased Ricochet Damage, Burning Damage, and Burning Duration.

left.name: Burning Rage
left.description:
Killing an enemy with Incendiary Damage will grant a Stack of Flame Affinity for a Duration.
 Flame Affinity Stacks grant increased Reload Speed and Action Skill Cooldown Rate.
 Max Flame Affinity Stacks: 5 Flame Affinity Stack Duration: 30s

left.name: Ballistic Bulwark
left.description: Amon gains Overshield when he deals Ordnance Damage.

left.name: Disco Infernus
left.description:
Whenever Amon applies Burning to an enemy, he gains increased Fire Rate for a Duration.
 This effect can stack.
 Max Stacks: 3 Stack Duration: 7s

left.name: Worldbreaker
left.description:
Whenever Amon Ground Slams, he consumes all Flame Affinity Stacks to create a Flame Fissure in front of him, dealing Incendiary Melee Damage to all enemies hit.
 Worldbreaker deals Bonus Damage for each Stack of Flame Affinity consumed.
 Bonus Damage: +25% /stack Cooldown: 60s

left.name: Cooling Mantle
left.description:
Partially Restore Worldbreaker's Cooldown.
 Worldbreaker Cooldown Restore: 6s

middle.name: Icy Rage
middle.description:
Killing an enemy with Cryo Damage will grant a Stack of Cryo Affinity for a Duration.
 Cryo Affinity Stacks grant increased Gun Damage.
 Max Stacks: 5 Stack Duration: 30s

middle.name: Northern Wind
middle.description:
Amon's Gun Critical Hits have a Chance to apply additional Slow to enemies, as if dealt Cryo Damage.
 Chance is Doubled while his Action Skill is active.
 Slow Amount: 25%

middle.name: Winter's Kiss
middle.description: Whenever Amon deals Ordnance Damage, he consumes a Stack of Cryo Affinity for each nearby enemy to spawn an Elemental Shard, dealing Cryo Damage in an area.

middle.name: Primal Surge
middle.description:
Whenever Amon applies a Status Effect to an enemy, there is a Chance to partially restore his Shield and Ammo.
 Restoration Chance: 25%

middle.name: Age of Ice
middle.description: Amon deals increased Damage to Frozen enemies and Bosses.

middle.name: Caroming Shard
middle.description: Elemental Shard has a Chance to Ricochet.

right.name: Blackout
right.description: Ordnance Damage has a Chance to Critically Hit, and Shock enemies when they do.

right.name: Thunderous Rage
right.description:
Killing an enemy with Shock Damage will grant a Stack of Shock Affinity for a Duration.
 Shock Affinity Stacks grant increased Critical Hit Damage.
 Max Shock Affinity Stacks: 5 Shock Affinity Duration: 30s

right.name: Tactician
right.description:
While Hipfiring, Amon gains increased Fire Rate, but decreased Gun Handling.
 While Aiming, Amon gains increased Gun Damage and Gun Handling.

right.name: Smelter
right.description: Amon Restores a percentage of Forgeskill Cooldown.

right.name: Strike the Anvil
right.description: Whenever Amon deals Action Skill Damage, he consumes a Stack of Shock Affinity to cause an Elemental Bolt to strike that enemy, dealing Shock Damage.

right.name: High Voltage
right.description:
Elemental Bolts now Stagger enemies, and consume an additional Stack of Shock Affinity to Multiply Damage Dealt.
 Bosses cannot be Staggered, and Badasses have a reduced Chance to be Staggered.
 Elemental Bolt Damage: +200%

augments.name: Blastchill
augments.description:
Forgewaves now consume more Vengeance and explode on impact, dealing Cryo Ordnance Damage in an area.
 Explosion Radius is further increased if the Forgewave passes through Firewall.
 Forgewave Damage: 4,015 Forgewave Vengeance Cost: 30% Explosion Radius: +50%

augments.name: Cryonic Thrum
augments.description:
While Scourge is active, Amon Taunts enemies and sends out a Cryonic Pulse every second, dealing Cryo Damage to enemies, and restoring Allies' Health.
 While Aiming, Amon's Movement Speed is reduced, but Amon gains Bonus Cryo Damage with Guns and consumes Vengeance on each Gun Shot.
 Pulse Damage: 535 Health Restoration: 535 Move Speed: -60% while Aiming Bonus Cryo Damage: 35% Vengeance Consumed: 2.
5%

augments.name: Molten Rebuke
augments.description:
Forgewave is now Molten Rebuke.
 Press Action Skill to Consume all Vengeance and throw the Forgeshield at target enemy, dealing Incendiary Ordnance Damage, and Ricocheting on impact.
 Molten Rebuke Ricochets additional times based on Vengeance consumed.
 Whenever the Forgeshield is thrown, Damage Absorption is Disabled until it returns.
 Forgeshield Damage: 4,667 Extra Ricochet: +1 per 20% Vengeance

augments.name: Eternal Winter
augments.description:
Forgewaves now partially restore Action Skill Duration and Firewall Duration on damaging enemies, and can be activated three times in succession.
 The third activation launches a Massive Forgewave that deals increased Damage and does not consume Vengeance.
 Action Skill Duration Restoration: 2.
5% Firewall Duration Restoration: 5% Massive Forgewave Damage: 7,897

augments.name: Stormlance
augments.description:
Forgewave is now Stormlance.
 Press Action Skill to throw a Forgespear, dealing Shock Ordnance Damage on impact, consuming Vengeance to increase Damage Dealt.
 Enemies damaged by Forgespear are Primed for a Duration, and will Detonate when they are damaged by a Forgeskill, dealing Shock Damage to the target, but none to nearby enemies.
 Detonations can also be caused by Gun Critical Hits, but deal less Damage.
 This effect can stack.
 Forgespear Damage: 8,923 Vengeance Consumed: 20% Detonation Damage: 4,461 Gun Critical Hit Detonation Damage: -50% Prime Duration: 10s Max Prime Stacks: 10

capstones.name: Ring of Frostfire
capstones.description:
Firewall is now a Ring that deals Incendiary Status Effect Damage to enemies inside of it, and Cryo Damage to enemies who enter or leave.
 Firewall grants Friendly Projectiles that pass through it further increased Damage and Projectile Speed.
 Incendiary Damage/s: 535 Cryo Damage: 1,785 Friendly Projectile Damage: +50% Friendly Projectile Speed: +100% Cooldown: 60s

capstones.name: Glacial Rapture
capstones.description:
Firewall is now Glacial Rapture.
 Press and hold Action Skill to swing Forgewhips, dealing Cryo Ordnance Damage over 2 Hits to nearby enemies before slamming into the ground, creating a Cryonic Fissure that deals Cryo Ordnance Damage and leaves Cryo Hazards for a Duration.
 Forgewhip Damage: 3,123 /hit Fissure Damage: 7,584 Hazard Damage/s: 2,677 Hazard Duration: 6s Cooldown: 60s

capstones.name: Wrathfall
capstones.description:
Firewall is now Wrathfall.
 Press and hold Action Skill to call down a Massive Forgesword to strike a target enemy, dealing Shock Ordnance Damage to enemies in the area.
 Wrathfall always Critically Hits.
 Damage: 9,815 Cooldown: 45s

top.name: Impetus
top.description:
Amon gains increased Shield Regeneration Rate and Movement Speed for a Duration.
 This effect can stack.
 Max Stacks: 3 Stack Duration: 15s

top.name: What Burns Within
top.description: Amon gains increased Incendiary Damage.

top.name: Discombobulate
top.description: Amon gains Melee Critical Hit Chance.

top.name: Heavy Plate
top.description: Amon gains increased Maximum Shield Capacity and Maximum Overshield Capacity.

top.name: Wield the Storm
top.description: Amon gains increased Status Effect Damage and Status Effect Duration.

top.name: Gut Punch
top.description:
Melee Damage and Ordnance Damage have a chance to apply Weakness to enemies for a Duration.
 Weakened enemies deal reduced Damage, and take increased Damage.
 Weakness is affected by Status Effect Duration, and is itself considered a Status Effect.
 Enemy Damage Dealt: -40% Enemy Damage Taken: +20% Duration: 8s

top.name: Tritanium Knuckles
top.description: Amon gains increased Melee Damage and Skill Damage.

top.name: Forged in Steel
top.description:
Amon becomes immune to all Damage for a brief Duration whenever he activates a Forgeskill.
 Immune Duration: 6s

top.name: Bullet Storm
top.description:
Whenever Amon applies a Status Effect, he gains increased Gun Damage for a Duration.
 This effect can stack.
 Max Stacks: 5 Stack Duration: 10s

top.name: Metal Urge
top.description:
Whenever Amon deals Gun Damage, he gains increased Action Skill Cooldown Rate for a Duration.
 This effect can stack.
 Max Stacks: 20 Stack Duration: 12s

top.name: The Best Defense
top.description: Amon gains Overshield whenever he deals Melee Damage.

left.name: Berserk
left.description:
Whenever Amon activates his Forgeskill, he becomes Berserk for a Duration, gaining Slow Immunity, and Bonus Cryo Damage with Gun Damage and Melee Damage.
 Duration: 15s

left.name: Bloodlust
left.description:
Whenever Amon's Shield Breaks, he gains Bloodlust for a Duration, gaining increased Reload Speed and Lifesteal.
 Bloodlust is also activated on Action Skill Activation.
 Duration: 8s

left.name: There is only Red
left.description:
Whenever Amon kills an enemy while Berserk is active, partially restore Berserk's Duration, and increase Bonus Cryo Damage from Berserk.
 Duration Restoration: 4s

left.name: Rimebreak
left.description:
Whenever Amon's Shield Breaks, he partially Restores Shield and Detonates, dealing Cryo Damage to all nearby enemies and Freezing them.
 Cooldown: 45s

left.name: Brimming Vigor
left.description: Amon gains increased Maximum Health Capacity and deals increased Melee Damage the more full his Health.

left.name: My Touch is Death
left.description: Whenever Amon deals Melee Damage, there is a chance to Activate Kill Skills.

middle.name: Into the Fray
middle.description:
Amon gains increased Damage Dealt and Damage Reduction based on his distance from the enemy.
 The closer the enemy, the greater the bonus.

middle.name: Burning Ramparts
middle.description: Amon gains increased Fire Rate and Status Effect Chance the more full his Shields.

middle.name: Harbinger
middle.description:
Amon gains increased Melee Damage and Maximum Shield Capacity for a Duration.
 This effect can stack.
 Max Stacks: 5 Stack Duration: 20s

middle.name: Rearm
middle.description: Whenever Amon deals Damage with a Melee Attack, his current Gun has its Ammo partially refilled.

middle.name: Maiming Strike
middle.description:
Gun Critical Hits have a chance to apply Weakness to enemies for a Duration.
 Weakened enemies deal reduced Damage, and take increased Damage.
 Weakness is affected by Status Effect Duration, and is itself considered a Status Effect.
 Enemy Damage Dealt: -40% Enemy Damage Taken: +20% Duration: 8s

middle.name: Mortal Flare
middle.description:
Whenever Amon kills a Weakened enemy, they Detonate, dealing Incendiary Melee Damage to nearby enemies.
 Cooldown: 5s

right.name: Catastrophe
right.description:
Whenever Amon applies Shock to an enemy, he gains increased Critical Hit Chance for a Duration.
 Whenever Amon applies Burning to an enemy, he gains increased Critical Hit Damage for a Duration.
 Both effects stack separately.
 Max Stacks: 3 Stack Duration: 12s

right.name: Dragon's Breath
right.description:
Whenever Amon Activates his Ordnance, his next Gun Shot is converted to Incendiary Damage, Staggering damaged enemies, and gaining increased Damage Dealt.
 Bosses cannot be Staggered, and Badasses have a chance to be Staggered.

right.name: Judgment
right.description: Amon deals increased Melee Damage to enemies below 50% total HP.

right.name: Fists of Stone
right.description:
Whenever Amon deals Melee Damage, Restore a percentage of Forgeskill Cooldown.
 Melee Attacks Double this effect.

right.name: Crackling Aegis
right.description:
Amon gains increased Status Effect Damage and Ordnance Damage based on his Shields.
 The fuller his Shield, the greater the effect.

right.name: Electrical Fire
right.description:
Whenever Amon Burns an enemy, he also Shocks them.
 Whenever Amon Shocks an enemy, he also Burns them.
 Cooldown: 2s

augments.name: Pyroclast
augments.description:
Whenever Onslaughter is activated, Amon fully Restores his Health and Shield, and is surrounded by a Forgestorm that deals Incendiary Status Effect Damage to nearby enemies over time.
 Killing an enemy inside of the Forgestorm restores Amon's Action Skill Duration, and increases Forgestorm's Damage.
 Forgestorm Damage/s: 535 Active Skill Duration Restore: 20% Forgestorm Damage: +20% /kill Max Bonus Damage: +200%

augments.name: Thermal Diffusion
augments.description:
Rocket Punch now has two modes, gains increased Radius, and deals Bonus Damage based on Amon's Maximum Shield Capacity.
 Pressing Action Skill causes Rocket Punch to deal Incendiary Melee Attack Damage.
 Pressing Melee causes Rocket Punch to deal Cryo Melee Attack Damage.
 Rocket Punch Radius: +100% Bonus Damage: +20% Max-Shield

augments.name: Fellfrost
augments.description:
Pressing Action Skill immediately after a Rocket Punch causes Amon to use a follow-up attack, dealing Cryo Melee Attack Damage in a large area in front of Amon.
 Non-Boss enemies hit below 25% Total HP are killed.
 Follow Up Damage: 11,154

augments.name: Force of Nature
augments.description:
While Onslaughter is active, Gun Damage dealt to enemies will Prime them for a Duration, and will Detonate when they die or are damaged by a Forgeskill, dealing Incendiary Damage to nearby enemies.
 Detonations can also be caused by Melee Attack Damage, but deal less Damage.
 This effect can stack.
 Detonation Damage: 100% of Gun Damage Dealt Max Prime Stacks: 10 Prime Duration: 10s Melee Explosion Damage: -50%

augments.name: Fulminating Fist
augments.description:
Amon gains increased Status Effect Chance while Onslaughter is active.
 Pressing Action Skill launches a concentrated Lightning Wave that deals Shock Melee Attack Damage to enemies it passes through.
 Lightning Wave Damage: ,417 Status Effect Chance: +30%

capstones.name: Hoarcleave
capstones.description:
Molten Slam is now Hoarcleave.
 Press and hold Action Skill to swing a Massive Forgeaxe, launching a Forgewave that deals Cryo Melee Damage and Freezes enemies it passes through.
 Enemies killed by Hoarcleave cause a Detonation, dealing Cryo Damage.
 Forgewave Damage: 6,558 Detonation Damage: 6,558 Cooldown: 55s

capstones.name: Molten Roil
capstones.description:
Molten Slam gains increased Radius and Stores Damage.
 Pyres erupt under up to 3 enemies after a delay.
 Pyres deal additional Incendiary Melee Damage based on Damage Stored by Molten Slam, distributed among the remaining targets.
 Radius: +33% Damage Stored: 40% of Damage Dealt Cooldown: 70s

capstones.name: Stormcutter
capstones.description:
Molten Slam is now Stormcutter.
 Press and hold Action Skill to swing a Massive Forgesword, launching a Forgewave that deals Shock Melee Damage to all enemies it passes through.
 Restore Action Skill Cooldown, Action Skill Duration, and Ordnance Cooldown for each enemy hit.
 Forgewave Damage: 8,477 Active Skill Cooldown Restore: 20% Active Skill Duration Restore: 20% Ordnance Cooldown Restore: 20% Cooldown: 65s

top.name: Mains Hum
top.description: Harlowe gains increased Maximum Shield Capacity and increased Maximum Overshield Capacity.

top.name: Personal Observation
top.description: Harlowe deals increased Melee Damage and her Melee Attacks gain a chance to Entangle enemies.

top.name: Action at a Distance
top.description: Whenever Harlowe applies a Status Effect to an enemy, she gains a chance to apply that Status Effect to each Entangled enemy.

top.name: Momentum
top.description:
Whenever Harlowe Entangles an enemy, she and her allies deal increased Critical Hit Damage.
 Duration: 12s

top.name: Mass Function
top.description: Harlowe and her allies gain increased Reload Speed for every Entangled enemy.

top.name: Neutron Decay
top.description:
Whenever Harlowe Irradiates an enemy, she gains increased Gun Damage.
 This effect can stack.
 Max Stacks: 5 Stack Duration: 12s

top.name: Heat Death
top.description: Harlowe gains increased Cryo Efficiency.

top.name: Creative Overflow
top.description:
Harlowe deals increased Gun Damage based on her Overshield.
 The more Overshield she has, the bigger the bonus.

top.name: Resonance Cascade
top.description:
Whenever Harlowe deals Radiation Damage to an enemy, she gains increased Action Skill Damage.
 This effect can stack.
 Max Stacks: 5 Stack Duration: 8s

top.name: Confirmative Reality
top.description: Whenever Harlowe shoots an Entangled enemy, she and all allies restore a portion of their Action Skill Cooldown.

top.name: Absolute Zero
top.description:
Whenever Harlowe Freezes an enemy, she receives a Stack of Zero Point.
 For every Stack of Zero Point, her Action Skill Duration freezes for a short time.

left.name: Blue Shift
left.description:
While her Action Skill is Cooling Down, Harlowe deals Bonus Cryo Damage with her Melee Attacks.
 While her Action Skill is Active, Harlowe deals Bonus Radiation Damage with her Melee Attacks.

left.name: Decoherence
left.description:
Harlowe deals increased Damage with all sources to Entangled enemies.
 Enemies inside of her Flux Generator take further increased Damage.

left.name: Latent Charge
left.description:
Harlowe deals Bonus Damage with Guns, Melee Attacks, and Action Skills while she has Overshield.
 The more Overshield she has, the bigger the bonus.

left.name: Feedback Loop
left.description:
Whenever Harlowe Entangles an enemy, she gains increased Action Skill Damage, Action Skill Duration, and Action Skill Cooldown Rate.
 This effect can stack.
 Max Stacks: 5 Stack Duration: 8s

left.name: Runaway Reaction
left.description:
Harlowe gains increased Status Effect Chance.
 Whenever Harlowe applies a Status Effect to an enemy, it becomes Entangled.

middle.name: Gamma Ray Burst
middle.description: Whenever Harlowe retriggers her Action Skill, the next shot fired from her Gun drains her Shield and deals Bonus Radiation Damage based on the amount drained.

middle.name: Harlowe's Certainty Principle
middle.description: Harlowe gains increased Gun Handling, which is further increased with every enemy in her Flux Generator.

middle.name: Jaunt
middle.description: Press and hold Melee Attack to make Harlowe swap places with her Flux Generator.

middle.name: Critical Funding
middle.description:
Whenever Harlowe Critically Hits an enemy, she gains a chance to Entangle it, and Refills a portion of her Gun's Magazine.
 Chance: 15%

middle.name: Exposed Core
middle.description: While her Shield is down, Harlowe gains increased Status Effect Chance.

middle.name: Meltdown
middle.description: Harlowe's Critical Hits with Guns deal Bonus Radiation Damage.

right.name: Refraction
right.description:
Harlowe and her allies gain Ricochet Chance against Entangled enemies.
 Critical Hits Double this chance.
 Ricochets have Reduced Damage.
 Ricochet Damage: -50%

right.name: Excited State
right.description:
Harlowe gains increased Critical Hit Damage.
 Whenever an enemy is damaged by Harlowe's Action Skill, the next shot on that enemy will be an Automatic Critical Hit.

right.name: Accretion
right.description: Harlowe and her allies gain Lifesteal against Entangled enemies.

right.name: Distribution Function
right.description:
Whenever Harlowe's Action Skill damages an enemy, restore a portion of her and all allies' Shield Capacity.
 If their Shields are full, gain Overshield instead.

right.name: Pencils Down
right.description: While Harlowe's Action Skill is Cooling Down, she grants herself and her allies increased Reload Speed and Fire Rate.

right.name: Annihilation
right.description:

augments.name: Coronal Mass Ejection
augments.description:

augments.description:
Harlowe's Flux Generator gains increased Radius.
 Additionally, whenever she retrieves Flux Generator, she creates a Cryo Hazard where her Flux Generator was located, and a Radiation Hazard wherever she next places her Flux Generator.
 Only one of each of these Hazards may be active at a time.
 Terminal Radius: +50% Hazard Damage/s: 803 Hazard Duration: 5s

augments.name: Unified Theory
augments.description:
Harlowe's Flux Generator gains increased Action Skill Damage.
 This effect is increased based on how many Allies and Enemies are inside of her Flux Generator.

augments.name: Nuclear Winter
augments.description:
Whenever Harlowe and her allies are inside the Flux Generator's Radius, they deal Bonus Cryo Damage.
 Whenever Harlowe and her allies leave the Flux Generator's Radius, they instead deal Bonus Radiation Damage for a Duration.
 Whenever Harlowe inflicts Cryo or Radiation Status Effects, that enemy becomes Entangled.
 Bonus Cryo Damage: 25% of Damage Dealt Bonus Radiation Damage: 25% of Damage Dealt Bonus Damage Duration: 12s

augments.name: Perpetual Engine
augments.description:
When Harlowe activates her Flux Generator, she gains Damage Reduction and increased Action Skill Duration for each Entangled enemy and each additional enemy she Entangles while her Action Skill is active.
 Damage Reduction: +7% per Entangled enemy Action Skill Duration: +7% per Entangled enemy

capstones.name: Potential Transference
capstones.description:
Whenever Harlowe relocates her Flux Generator, it Teleports to a location in her crosshairs, consuming a Charge and creating a Shock Burst that deals Shock Damage to enemies inside it, grants a free Second Wind to allies, and Heals allies within the Flux Generator.
 Burst Damage: 7,138 Health Restore: 1,472 Charges: 3 Action Skill Duration: 22s Action Skill Cooldown: 52s

capstones.name: Violent Horizon
capstones.description:
Harlowe's Flux Generator occasionally shoots Radiation Projectiles at nearby enemies outside of its radius.
 If these Projectiles Irradiate an enemy, the Flux Generator then drags them within its radius.
 Retrigger: Harlowe's Flux Generator creates a Singularity burst that drags in nearby enemies and increases Action Skill Damage.
 Damage: 3,569 Action Skill Damage: +10% per Retrigger Action Skill Duration: 25s Action Skill Cooldown: 60s Retrigger Cooldown: 3s

capstones.name: Group Study
capstones.description:
Harlowe spawns a HALO Sidekick for each ally instead of her Flux Generator.
 HALO Sidekicks automatically fly to each ally and hover near them, granting increased Gun Damage, Fire Rate, and Reload Speed.
 Action Skill Retrigger: Overload Harlowe's HALO Sidekicks to increase their effects.
 This effect stacks.
 While Overloaded, Harlowe's Action Skill Duration drains faster.
 Gun Damage: +25% /activation Fire Rate : +10% /activation Reload Speed: +10% /activation Duration Rate: +25% /activation Action Skill Duration: 28s Action Skill Cooldown: 32s

middle.description:

augments.description:

augments.description:

 This Radiation Nova deals Damage based on remaining Action Skill Duration.
 Bonus Radiation Damage: 25% of Damage Dealt Duration Restored: 1% of Duration Radiation Nova Damage: 4,461

augments.description:
All Damage Dealt to enemies in Stasis is stored.
 Whenever an enemy is Slammed or Stasis ends, create a Cryo Explosion based on all Stored Damage and centered on that enemy, and also automatically Freeze other enemies nearby.

augments.description:

 Using Blade Fury causes Rafa to consume all stored Damage, and deals Bonus Fire Damage based on stored Damage.
 A portion of all Damage dealt this way is returned to Rafa as Health.
 Health Drain: 1% of Total HP per second Bonus Fire Damage: Up to 50% of total Damage Taken Marked Enemy Damage: 20% of Damage Taken

capstones.name: Galvanic Panic

 Additionally, killing an enemy while Arc-Knives is active restores Action Skill Duration.
 Activating Blade Fury causes Rafa to fire a volley of Acid STRM Gliders in front of him and end Arc-Knives.

right.description:
When Vex uses a Repkit, Vex and her Minions gain Bonus Damage with Weapons and Melee Damage for a Duration.
 Bonus Damage Elemental Type is based on Vex's currently equipped Weapon.
 Duration: 15s

right.name: Stormblessed
right.description: Vex gains increased Shock Damage and Shock Status Effect Damage.

augments.name: Violent Outburst
augments.description:
Command Skill.
 Press and hold Action Skill to Command Trouble to explode himself, dealing Ordnance Damage to all nearby enemies and restoring Health to Vex.
 While Phase Phamiliar is active, sacrifice 33% of his Maximum Health Capacity instead.
 Damage 8,031 Max-Health Restored: 75%

augments.name: Blink Strike
augments.description:
Command Skill: Press and hold Action Skill to Command Trouble to Blink Strike target enemy, dealing Damage.
 Blink Strike always Critical Strikes enemies below 50% HP.
 Damage: 6,451 Cooldown: 25s

augments.name: Hexus Nexus
augments.description:
Trouble now Taunts enemies, making them more likely to target him.
 Command Skill: Press and Hold Action Skill to command Trouble to charge target enemy, dealing Melee Damage in an area on impact and creating a Singularity for a Duration.
 Damage: 6,246 Cooldown: 45s Singularity Duration: 10s

augments.name: Vorpal Fang
augments.description:
Trouble gains a chance to Critically Hit with all attacks.
 Command Skill.
 Press and Hold Action Skill to Command Trouble to summon Phase Daggers overhead that fire at nearby enemies, dealing Melee Damage on impact.
 Trouble Critical Hit Chance: +10% Phase Dagger Damage: 1,901 Phase Dagger Max Stack: 5 Phase Dagger Duration: 15s Cooldown: 35s

augments.name: Beast Mode
augments.description:
Command Skill: Press and hold Action Skill to Command Trouble to enter Beast Mode, becoming Immune to Damage and gaining increased Minion Attack Speed and Movement Speed for a Duration.
 Kill Skil: Extend Beast Mode's Duration.
 Trouble Attack Speed Multiplier: +30% Trouble Movement Speed Multiplier.
 +30% Cooldown: 25s Duration: 10s

capstones.name: Trouble Bubble
capstones.description:
Trouble now gains Overshield whenever he deals Damage.
 While Phase Phamiliar is active, Trouble gains an Elemental Aura, dealing Ordnance Damage over time to nearby enemies.
 Overshield Gained: 80% of Damage Dealt Aura Damage: 357 every 0.
5s

capstones.name: Double Trouble
capstones.description:
Trouble now gains a Chance to create an Illusion near the enemy when dealing Damage.
 Critical Hits have double that Chance.
 Illusions become Badasses while Phase Phamiliar is active.
 Illusion Chance: 15% Illusion Duration: 8s Illusion Damage Multiplier: 75% Illusion Damage Taken Multiplier: 300% Max Illusions: 3

capstones.name: Unsealed
capstones.description:
Trouble will now Mark his current target, causing them to take increased Gun Damage from Vex.
 When a Marked enemy is killed, Trouble gains a Stack of Unsealed for a Duration, granting Health Regeneration and increased Damage.
 While Phase Phamiliar is active, Unsealed effects are doubled.
 Gun Damage: +50% against Marked target Health Regeneration: +1% per Stack Damage Dealt: +15% per Stack Stack Duration: 12s Max Stacks: 3
